column4: I need some help. I am trying to install Xubuntu on a box, had to use the noapic flag, when it is booting it says it can't set fan (address) to 'off'. After a while the loop-prevention kicks in. Then it boots. So i went into gparted and tried to resize a partiton. I come back to the PC with all these warning saying the system is shutting off now because the temperature is -287degress Celcius. Now that is bullshit and something is w
rong, does anyone have any ideas on what I can do?
